page.title: 12My Weekly Diet
page.content: {MONDAY}Breakfast-coffee and biscuits. Dinner-a salad cob,cheese and onion crisps and cherry pop. Tea-beef and onion pie and chips. {TUESDAY}Breakfast-Rice Krispies. Dinner-a salad cob,Angel Delight and cherry pop. Tea-steak,yorkshire pudding,peas and roast and boiled potatoes. {WEDNESDAY}Breakfast-cornflakes. Dinner-steakburger on a cob and cherry pop. Tea-sausages,mushrooms,beans and egg. {THURSDAY}Breakfast-Rice Krispies. Dinner-a salad cob and cherry pop. Tea-Crispy pancake,chips and peas. {FRIDAY}Breakfast Rice Krispies. Dinner-cheese and onion cob and cherry pop and ice-cream. TEa-chicken,peas,cabbage,and roast and boiled potatoes. A bar of chocolate every day.
